org.jacp.api.component
Interface IComponent<L,A,M>

Type Parameters:
L - defines the action listener type
A - defines the basic action type
M - defines the basic message type
All Known Subinterfaces:
ICallbackComponent<L,A,M>, IMapReudce<L,A,M>, IPerspective<L,A,M>, IStateLessCallabackComponent<L,A,M>, ISubComponent<L,A,M>, IVComponent<C,L,A,M>
public interface IComponent<L,A,M>

This Interface represents a very basic component that can exists in JACP environment.

Author:
Andy Moncsek

Method Summary
 IActionListener<L,A,M> getActionListener()
          Returns an action listener (for local, target and global use).

          Returns the id of the component.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Returns the name of a component.
 boolean isActive()
          Get the default active status of component.
 boolean isStarted()
          Get if component was activated, can occur if message was send before "init" message arrived

          Set default active state of component.
 void setId(java.lang.String id)
          Set unique id of component.
 void setMessageQueue(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<IAction<A,M>> messageQueue)
          Set message queue to component
 void setName(java.lang.String name)
          Defines the name of a component.

          Set if component was activated, can occur if message was send before "init" message arrived
